title: PMS 2.0 333 - NFL Divisional Playoffs Preview, DeForest Buckner, Mark Schlereth, Dan Orlovsky, Ariel Helwani, & AJ Hawk
description: On today’s show, Pat and the boys react to the Bob Saleh to the Jets news, chat more about Urban Meyer to Jacksonville, and Pat and AJ Hawk look at the lines of all the Divisional Round Playoff football games this weekend and make their gambling picks. Also joining the show is 3x Super Bowl Champion, 2x Pro Bowler, Denver Broncos 50th Anniversary Team member, NFL on Fox color commentator, and friend of the program, Mark Schlereth to chat about the playoff games this weekend, where the matchups will ultimately be won, who he likes, and he shares a couple hilarious stories from his time in the NFL (17:45-38:01). Next, 2x All-Pro, Pro Bowler, force at DT for the Indianapolis Colts, DeForest Buckner joins Pat and AJ Hawk to discuss his experience in Indy, what the culture in San Francisco was like, playing with Phil Rivers, being from Hawaii, and what it's like being a massive dude (49:17-1:04:36). Next, 12 year NFL veteran at QB, and co-host of NFL Live on ESPN, Dan Orlovsky joins the show to chat about Dan Campbell likely being the next Head Coach for the Lions, why he loves the hire, if he'll coach in the NFL, and if he thinks he would be good (1:07:18-1:15:39). Later, joining Pat and AJ Hawk is ESPN MMA Insider, friend of the show, and "massive Bills fan," Ariel Helwani to chat about the game this weekend and how he's feeling, and about his exclusive sit-down interview with Conor McGregor (1:28:56-1:44:02). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
